```

<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Random Number Generator</title>
    <script src="img/random.js" defer></script>
</head>

<button disabled>Generate number</button>
<label for="max">up to</label>
<input type="number" id="max" name="rand_max" value="10" />
</body>
</html>
```
